pages.text: I do not worship what you worship
and you do not worship what I worship
Nor will I worship what you worship
nor will you worship what I worship
You have your deen and I have my deen.´
When Allah´s help and victory have arrived
and you have seen people entering Allah´s deen in droves
then glorify your Lord´s praise and ask His forgiveness. He is the Ever-Returning
Ruin to the hands of Abu Lahab and ruin to him
His wealth has not helped him nor anything he has earned
He will burn in a Flaming Fire
And so will his wife, the firewood-carrier
with a rope of twisted fibre round her neck
